Package controller

Class ModifyCustomer

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyCustomer
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyCustomer extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
ModifyCustomer is the controller class for the Modify Customer screen. It contains FXML object fields and event handler methods to facilitate user interaction with the GUI.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the Modify Customer Screen. It formats and sets items to the Country ComboBox.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - the url
      resourceBundle - the resourceBundle

    • OnActionModifyCustomer

      public void OnActionModifyCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method retrieves data from the form fields and uses it to update the customer row in the database. Several error checks are performed for input validation. It then navigates to the MainMenu screen
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - represents a save button click
      Throws:
      IOException - This method can throw an IO Exception if the fxml file cannot be found.

    • OnActionToMainMenu

      public void OnActionToMainMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This handler method navigates to the Main Menu Screen
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - represents a cancel button click
      Throws:
      IOException - This method can throw an IO Exception if the fxml file cannot be found.

    • lookupCustomerCountry

      public Country lookupCustomerCountry(Customer selectedCustomer)
      This method is used to find the customer associated country.
      Parameters:
      selectedCustomer - the selected customer
      Returns:
      the country

    • lookupCustomerDivision

      public FirstLevelDivision lookupCustomerDivision(Customer selectedCustomer)
      This method is used to find the customer associated division.
      Parameters:
      selectedCustomer - the selected customer
      Returns:
      the division

    • SetModCustomerFields

      public void SetModCustomerFields(Customer customer)
      This method is used to pass customer information between the TableView on the previous screen to the form fields on this screen.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer

    • OnCountrySelection

      public void OnCountrySelection(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This handler method sets the list of available divisions in the division ComboBox when a country is selected in the country ComboBox
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - represents a country selection in the ComboBox
